Biotronik Renamic Top Loading Programmer Bag

The Biotronik Open Cart Renamic programmer bag is designed to be a light weight compact option to hold and transport your programmer, documents, accessories, and cables. The bag is made of the best materials available and comes standard with our heavy duty wheel system. There are other companies that have tried to make this bag using cheap wheels and plastics. Do not be fooled by cheap imitations. Our Open Carts our built to last. It is NOT designed to hold the Biotronik ICS 3000 programmer.

CUSTOM BAG FEATURES:

  • Biotronik (or any other) Company Logo
  • Telescoping pull handle
  • Our Watts Bags exclusive wheel system
  • Plastic guards to prevent handle from denting
  • Commercial grade buckles, handles, fabrics, and zippers
  • 1 Large outer pouch pockets for all of your accessories

BIOTRONIK RENAMIC TOP LOADING PROGRAMMER BAG

  • Rigid Weight: 6.5 lbs
  • External Dimensions: 25" Deep x 15" Wide x 10.5" Long
  • Internal Dimensions: 24.25" Deep x 13" Wide x 5.75" Long
Learn more about bag features
  • Available Colors:
  • Watts Wheel System: Yes
  • Internal Divider Options: Yes
  • Custom Embroidery: Yes
  • Price: $165
